duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and monitor primary functions of Production Control department including internal logistics, production planning, capacity analysis, external logistics, inventory control, packaging, service, and MRO storeroom.
Develop production control strategy to satisfy customers, shareholders, and team members.
Participate as key member of leadership team helping to set direction for organization and support continual improvement.
Observe department performance, analyze cause & effect, and take appropriate action.
Develop and be accountable to operating plan and financial commitments.
Communicate operating plan targets, action plans, and status on a regular basis to all members.
Promote continuous improvement in safety, quality, delivery, and cost performance through Kaizen and leading positive change.
Support staff, team leaders, and team members by providing training, instruction, and leadership with regards to their personal growth and job performance.
Support JNA initiatives for synergistic systems that will benefit JNA in total.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors in Logistics or Related Field and/or 10 years job-related experience
